TRANSLATION
WALLOON GOVERNMENT SERVICE
[2019/201844]
4 APRIL 2019. — Decree on individual vocational training (1)
The Walloon Parliament has adopted and We, the Walloon Government, ratify the following:
Article 1. This decree partly regulates, in accordance with Article 138 of the Constitution, a matter
referred to in Article 127, § 1, thereof.
The provisions relating to the matter referred to in paragraph 1 shall be applicable in the territory of the
French-speaking area.
Art. 2. For the purposes of this Decree:
1 o « FOREm » : the ʺOffice wallon de la Formation professionnelle et de l'Emploiʺ, created by the decree of
6 May 1999 concerning the ʺOffice wallon de la formation professionnelle et de l'Emploiʺ;
2 o the trainee: any unemployed jobseeker who is registered as such with FOREm and who has a
enters into an entry-level training agreement with an employer and [] « FOREm »;
3 o employer : any natural or legal person who has its registered office or a business unit in the French
language area in which the trainee is hired and supervised, with the exception of companies recognized under
the law of 20 July 2001 on the promotion of neighborhood services and jobs for the employees it hires with
the employment contract service vouchers and excluding the local employment agencies, referred to
by Article 79 of the Royal Decree of 25 November 1991 on unemployment regulations, for the voor
PWA employees it hires;

Page 431
MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP

38401

4 o agreement for an entry-level training: the agreement concluded between a trainee, an employee and
ʺFOREmʺ, relating to individual vocational training with a view to the acquisition of skills de
which must enable the exercise of a professional activity with the employer;
5 o training provider :
a) « FOREM »;
b) the knowledge centres, as defined in Article 1 bis , 7 o , of the Decree of 6 May 1999 on the Office wallon
de la formation professionnelle et de l'emploiʺ;
c) any training provider called upon by ʺFOREm in accordance with Article 7 of the Decree of
6 May 1999 concerning the ʺOffice wallon de la formation professionnelle et de l'emploiʺ;
d) the training centers of the IFAPME network: the training centers recognized in accordance with the decree of the Walloon
Government of 24 April 2014 determining the conditions for the recognition of training centers for
the self-employed and small and medium-sized enterprises and their center directors;
e) any third party other than those referred to under a) to d), reimbursed by the employer;
6 o training plan : the annex to the contract for an entry-level training, which is an integral part of it and
has the following minimum content:
- the description of the professional activity performed at the employer;
- the name of the mentor(s) responsible for the follow-up and supervision of the trainee;
- the training program, as mutually developed by the employer and « FOREm », with a list of the
activities specific to the professional activity, performed at the employer, as well as the competences necessary for the
exercise of the relevant profession, which the trainee has only partially or not completely mastered;
- where applicable, if the employer is a temporary agency worker, the user with whom the
implementation of the agreement for an entry-level training is completed.
The definitions included in the first paragraph can be further determined by the Government.
The Government may specify specific conditions for the conclusion of an entry-level training agreement
for certain categories of employers.
Art. 3. The contract for entry-level training is concluded with the employer and, where appropriate, with a
training provider.
Where the entry-level training agreement includes training with a training provider, the
implementation of the training is an integral part of the contract for an entry-level training.
Art. 4. The Government determines the detailed rules for the submission of the application, the duration, the content, the details
rules for concluding and executing the contract for an entry-level training and the conditions in which this
can be terminated early.
The Government may reserve the conclusion of a contract for an entry-level training of a longer duration
for some categories determined by it.
Art. 5. § 1. The employer who concludes an entry-level training agreement:
1 o does not exhibit any claimable debt towards ʺFOREmʺ;
2 o is, in the two previous years, not the subject of an administrative fine referred to in
article 12;
3 o undertakes to train the trainee by entrusting him with tasks related to the
training plan of the contract for an entry-level training;;
4 o appoints himself as a mentor or appoints one or more mentors among his staff who is or are in charge of
the follow-up and supervision of the trainee during the duration of the training;
5 o insures the trainee against work accidents and accidents on the way to and from work by a
insurance policy with fixed premiums with a recognized insurance company or recognized insurance company
treasury offering him the same benefits as those charged to the insurer under the law of
April 10, 1971 on the accidents at work;
6 o pays « FOREm » a monthly fixed financial contribution linked to the future salary of
the intern;
7 o organizes the trainee's training with a training provider referred to in Article 2, paragraph 1, 5 o , e); when
the training is not available at a training provider referred to in Article 2, paragraph 1, 5 o , a) to d)
8 o evaluates, in relation to the training plan, the professional skills acquired by the trainee after
expiry of the contract for an entry-level training with a view to the issuance of the certificate of
professional competences, acquired during the entry-level training contract, the model of which is provided by
ʺFOREmʺ is determined;
9 o employs the trainee at the latest after the termination of the agreement for an entry-level training, in the context of
an employment contract in the learned profession, for a duration that is at least equal to the initial duration of the
contract for an entry-level training;
10 o is not authorized to dismiss staff with a view to hiring a trainee with a
agreement for an entry-level training or upon the subsequent employment of the trainee;
11 o undertakes not to enter into an entry-level training agreement with a trainee who has passed
a work-linked learning agreement, an in-company internship agreement or a work-alternative agreement
training with the same trainee for the same profession;
12 o « FOREm » provides the necessary assistance for the follow-up and review of the agreement for a
entry-level training;
13 o « FOREm » provides the trainee's performance statements on a monthly basis;
14 o provides for the safety of the trainee, provides him with the necessary clothing and safety equipment in function
of the tasks he completes in the implementation of the entry-level training contract;

Page 432
38402

MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
15 o conclude an insurance policy to cover the civil liability of the trainee for the damage
caused by third parties in the context of the implementation of the agreement for an entry-level training.
For the obligation referred to in paragraph 1, 5 o , the insurance policy shall, for the calculation of the indemnity
in the event of temporary incapacity for work, take into account a basic allowance set at twelve times the
average guaranteed minimum monthly income as determined at the time of the accident, with a collective
employment contract concluded in the National Labor Council for a full-time employee of at least nineteen years of age
old and who has at least six years' seniority in the company where he is employed. For the calculation of
the compensation in the event of permanent incapacity for work, the insurance policy takes into account a
basic allowance set at eighteen times the average guaranteed minimum monthly income as determined on
at the time of the accident, under a collective labor agreement concluded in the National Labor Council for a
full-time employee of at least nineteen years old and who has at least six years' seniority in the company
where he is employed.
The obligation referred to in paragraph 1, 9 o , can be fulfilled by another employer according to the conditions
established by the Government.
The obligation referred to in paragraph 1, 9 o , does not apply when the contract for an entry-level training
terminated before its expiry for a case of unilateral or mutually agreed breach.
The Government determines in more detail the modalities for the implementation of the conditions referred to in paragraph 1.
§ 2. The employer who does not observe the provisions referred to in paragraph 1 and its implementing measures,
side be excluded from the benefit of this decree for a period of one year and on repeat, during a period
of two years. The Government shall determine the detailed rules for the implementation of this paragraph.
Art. 6. During the execution of the agreement for an entry-level training, the trainee remains registered as
unemployed job seeker.
In addition, the intern will receive, at the expense of ʺFOREmʺ:
1 o a monthly premium that amounts to at least twenty percent of the average guaranteed minimum
monthly income, determined by the National Labor Council, and which amounts to a maximum of eighty percent thereof,
according to the brackets linked to the unemployment benefit, the integration benefit, the living wage, the benefits
granted to persons with disabilities by the Directorate-General for Persons with Disabilities of the Federal
Public Service Social Security or the disability benefits awarded in accordance with the law
on the compulsory sickness and invalidity allowance of the trainee during the execution of the contract
for an entry-level course, the amounts and further rules of which are determined by the Government;
2 o compensation for travel expenses between the trainee's place of residence and the business unit of the
employer, specified in the agreement for an entry-level training, insofar as the distance between the two is at least
is five kilometers;
3 o if he has dependent children, a compensation of which the amount, as well as the deposit conditions and rules
have been established by the Government, to cover the costs of childcare, childcare, children's home or
school care proven by the intern.
The reimbursement of the costs incurred as referred to in paragraph 2, 2o , shall be limited to the cost price of the cheapest
means of transport for a daily outward and return journey, regardless of the mode of transport used.
In the case where the increase in the benefits and allowances referred to in paragraph 1 (A) represents a reduction of
the premium referred to in paragraph 2, 1 o , (B), such as the sums of the amounts A and B, is lower than the sum of those amounts at
the conclusion of the agreement for an entry-level training, the trainee can submit an application to ʺFOREmʺ for
increase of the premium referred to in paragraph 2, 1 o . The Government shall determine the detailed rules for the implementation of this paragraph.
Art. 7. Within the framework of this decree, ʺFOREmʺ has the following tasks:
1 o disseminate any information related to this decree to employers and job seekers;
2 o receive and process applications from employers and communicate them in relation to job seekers
bring;
3 o where appropriate, provide technical-pedagogical support to employers in drawing up the
training plans;
4 o recognize the training plans and their duration;
5 o pay the intern monthly the premiums and allowances referred to in Article 6, paragraph 2;
6 o the transactions for the collection of his claim in respect of the employer
carry out the monthly fixed financial allowance, as referred to in Article 5, § 1, paragraph 1, 6 o ;
7 o where applicable, the recourse to the training providers referred to in Article 2, paragraph 1, 5 o , a) to d)
to organize;
8 o pay the employer a fee for the costs of the training referred to in Article 5, § 1, paragraph 1, 7 o ;
9 o ensure the technical and pedagogical follow-up of agreements for an entry-level training.
The definitions included in the first paragraph can be further determined by the Government.
Art. 8. § 1. An advisory committee is established, with the task of the Government at the request of the
advise the employer about the duration and content of the training plan in the event of a disagreement between ʺFOREmʺ and the
employer.
The employer's application is submitted in accordance with the modalities determined by the Government.
§ 2. The committee shall deliver its opinion within three months of receipt of the
full advice request.
In the absence of communication within the time limit imposed, this formality will be disregarded.
§ 3. The Government shall communicate its decision to the employer within a period of two weeks from
the receipt of the advice or, if the advice has not been communicated, of the expiry of the period referred to
advice should be communicated.
In the absence of communication within the time limit imposed, the decision of the Government shall be deemed
to be beneficial to the employer.

Page 433
MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
§ 4. The committee consists of:

38403

1 o one representative of the Minister of Education, who acts as chairman;
2 o one representative of the Department of Employment and Vocational Training of the Operational
Directorate-General for Economy, Work and Research of the Walloon Public Service, which is its secretariat
perceives;
3 o one representative of « FOREm »;
4 o one representative of the representative employers' organisations;
5 o one representative of the representative employee organizations.
The members are appointed by the Government and, with regard to the members referred to in paragraph 1, 4 o to 5 o , on the
nomination of the institutions they represent, for a renewable period of five years.
The committee may call on one or more external experts with useful experience in the
handling of the files.
Art. 9. § 1. « FOREm » itself or through an external service provider develops an electronic platform for use
by ʺFOREmʺ or the employers for the performance of the tasks of FOREmʺ and the obligations of the
employer, determined by or pursuant to this decree, more specifically for:
1 o submitting the applications;
2 o acknowledging receipt of applications and their registration;
3 o the registration of entry-level courses and training plans;
4 o entering the data related to the performance of the trainees;
5 o the creation of data flows from the electronic platform to other digital databases of
ʺFOREmʺ or external service providers and vice versa, in the context of other legal or regulatory obligations;
6 o the implementation of regular monitoring of the entry training agreements and the results of the
activation.
Based on the information entered via the electronic platform, ʺFOREmʺ guarantees the updating of the
data in the electronic databases, accessible through the platform.
When the data is treated for purposes other than those stipulated by this decree,
ʺFOREmʺ check whether the treatment is based on a legal basis, recognized by European law or by Belgian law
straight.
§ 2. Be authorized to have access to the electronic platform, each as far as he is concerned:
1 o « FOREm » :
2 o the employers:
3 o the trainees.
§ 3. The information related to the acquisition of skills or professional experience by the trainee is
saved in his file.
§ 4. Anyone who uses the electronic platform complies with its terms of use.
§ 5. « FOREm » is responsible for the processing of personal data treated in accordance with this
article. This data is processed in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and
the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of
personal data and on the free movement of such data and repealing Directive 95/46/EC and the law
of 30 July 2018 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of
personal data. In particular, « FOREm » guarantees the right to information of data subjects regarding the processing
of the personal data.
§ 6. ʺFOREmʺ concludes an agreement with each processor in which, in particular, the obligations and responsible
rights of any person in connection with the processing of personal data and with their protection
determined.
§ 7. The Government determines the detailed rules for the implementation of paragraphs 1 to 4.
Art. 10. « FOREm » evaluates the application of this decree and carries out the budgetary follow-up according to
the further rules determined by the Government.
Art. 11. The monitoring of the application of this decree and of the relevant implementing measures is
exercised in accordance with the provisions of the Decree of 28 February 2019 on the control of the
legislation and regulations relating to retraining and further training as well as the introduction of
administrative fines applicable in the event of infringement of the said laws and regulations
gene.
Art. 12. In case of violation of Article 5, paragraph 1, 5 o , 6 o and 9 o an administrative fine of 300 to
3000 euros are imposed in accordance with the procedure and conditions established by the provisions of Chapter 9
of the Decree of 28 February 2019 on the control of legislation and regulations relating to
to retraining and further training as well as the introduction of administrative fines applicable in case
of infringement of said laws and regulations.
Art. 13. § 1. ʺFOREmʺ claims in any legal remedy, including compensation, the lump sum financial
allowances from the employer pursuant to this decree and which have remained unpaid.
§ 2. If the employer does not comply with the obligation to hire as stipulated in Article 5, § 1, paragraph 1, 9 o ,
has taken, « FOREm » may collect the whole of the undue amounts corresponding to the difference
between the monthly fixed financial allowances paid by the employer pursuant to Article 5, § 1,
paragraph 1, 6 o , and reclaim from the employer the sums paid by ʺFOREmʺ to the trainee pursuant to Article 6(2).
Art. 14. The Decree of 18 July 1997 on the integration of jobseekers with employers who have a
organize vocational training to fill a vacancy, as amended by the decrees of 4 July 2002,
November 22, 2007 and February 20, 2014, will be discontinued..

Page 434
38404

MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
Art. 15. The provisions of the Decree of 18 July 1997 on the employment of jobseekers at
employers who organize vocational training to fill a vacancy and its implementing decree of
14 November 2007 are further applied to the training agreements concluded for the
entry into force of this decree.
Art. 16. This decree enters into force on 1 May 2019.
The Government can postpone the entry into force of this decree until 1 May 2022 at the latest for the categories of:
government employers and for the professional activities performed by those employers.
Promulgate this decree, order that it be published in the Belgian Official Gazette .

SERVICE PUBLIC DE WALLONIA
[2019/201768]
28 FEVRIER 2019. — Arrêté du Gouvernement wallon relatif à l'incitant financier visant la mobilisation
des demandeurs d'emploi vers la formation
Le Gouvernement wallon,
Vu le décret du 6 mai 1999 relatif à l'Office wallon de la formation professionnelle et de l'emploi, l'article 5, paragraph 4,
modified by the décret of May 10, 2012;
Vu l'avis n o A.1383 du Conseil économique et social de Wallonie, donné le 24 September 2018;
Vu l'avis du Comité de gestion de l'Office wallon de la formation professionnelle et de l'emploi, donné
le 14 ao;t 2018;
Vu l'avis du Comité de gestion de l'Institut wallon de formation en alternance et des indépendants et petites et
moyennes entreprises, donné le 20 September 2018;
Vu le rapport du 3 juillet 2018 établi conformément à l'article 4, 2 o , du décret du 3 march 2016 visant à la mise en
œuvre des résolutions de la Conférence des Nations unions sur les femmes à Pékin de septembre 1995 et intégrant la
dimension du genre dans l'ensemble des politiques régionales, pour les matières réglées en vertu de l'article 138 de la
constitution;
Vu l'avis de l'Inspecteur des Finances, donné le 3 juillet 2018;
Vu l'accord du Ministre du Budget, donné le 12 juillet 2018;
Vu l'avis 64.751/4 du Conseil d'Etat, donné le 13 December 2018 and application de l'article 84, § 1 er , alinea 1 er , 2 o ,
des lois sur le Conseil d'Etat, coordonnées le 12 Janvier 1973;
Vu l'avis n o 27/2019 de l'Autorité de protection des données, donné le 6 février 2019;
Considérant que le Gouvernement grafting rétroagir faire le présent arrêté au one there septembre 2018;
Considérant que la retroactivité des acts administratifs est admise des lors qu'elle est nécessaire à la continuité du
service public et à la régularisation d'une situation de fait ou de droit, pour autant qu'elle respecte les exigences de la
sécurité juridique et les droits individuels;
Considérant l'urgence de solutionner les pénuries de main d'œuvre rencontrées en Wallonie (plus the
200,000 demandeurs d'emploi et 88 métiers réputés en pénurie) et en adéquation avec le Jobs Deal du fédéral;
Considérant que la liste des métiers en pénurie est publiée par le Forem chaque année, au mois de juin ;
Considérant que la majorité des formations éligibles à l'incitant financier et en private celles organisées par le
release IFAPME démarrent en September ;
Considérant que, dans son avis rendu le 24 September 2018, le Conseil économique et social de Wallonie constatait
que le projet d'arrêté ʺ est de facto entré en vigueur au 1 er septembre 2018 et fait déjà l'objet d'une campaign
d'information et de promotion de la part du Forem et de l'IFAPME;

Page 435
38405

MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
Considérant la volonté du Gouvernement d'encourager les demandeurs d'emploi à s'inscrire au plus vite dans ces
formations porteuses et donc à ne pas postposer leur entrée en formation dans l'attente de l'adoption du présent projet
d'arrêté;
Considérant que tous les trainees qui réussissent une formation éligible à l'incitant financier, au plus tôt le
1 there septembre 2018, POURRONT and bénéficier;
Que, des lors, si la retroactivité ne s'appliquait pas, un demandeur d'emploi qui, ayant pris connaissance de la liste
des métiers en pénurie telle que publiée en juin 2018, démarrait une formation dans la foulée et la réussissait avant
l'adoption définitive du present arrêté, ne pourrait pas bénéficier de l'incitant, alors que celui qui réussirait exactement
la meme formation, pour le meme métier, après l'adoption du présent arrêté serait éligible;
Considérant que la retroactivité du present projet constitue une façon de régulariser une situation de fait;
Considérant qu'en l'absence de pareille base légale, il y aurait lieu de considérer que les interns ayant réussi une
formation visant un métier en pénurie de main d'œuvre ou critique telle que visée à l'article 4, ou ayant quitté une telle
formation pour être occupé sous contrat de travail portant sur un emploi dans un métier en pénurie de main d'œuvre
ou dans une fonction critique ne pourraient benéficier de l'incitant financier jusqu'à l'adoption du projet;
Considérant que la non-rétroactivité constituerait une discrimination des administrés devant la loi;
Considérant que l'effet retroactif bénéficie donc aux intéresses et, en ce sens, se justifie;
Sur la proposition du Ministre de la Formation;
Apres deliberation,
Arrete :
Article 1 er . Le présent arrêté règle, en application de l'article 138 de la Constitution, une matière visée à l'article 127,
§ 1 er , the celle-ci.
Art. 2. Pour l'application du present arrêté, l'on entend par :
1 o le Ministre : le Ministre de la Formation;
2 o le Forem : l'Office wallon de la Formation professionnelle et de l'Emploi visé par le décret du 6 mai 1999 relatif
à l'Office wallon de la Formation professionnelle et de l'Emploi;
3 o l'IFAPME : l'Institut wallon de formation en alternance et des indépendants et petites et moyennes entreprises
visé par le décret du 17 juillet 2003 portant constitution d'un Institut wallon de formation en alternance et des
independants et petites et moyennes entreprises;
4 o l'opérateur de formation : le Forem, les centers de compétence, l'Enseignement de Promotion social pour les
formations professionnelles organisées par ou en vertu de la convention cadre de collaboration entre le Forem et
l'Enseignement de Promotion social, les opérateurs de formation professionnelle auquel le Forem recourt
conformément à l'article 7, paragraph 2, du décret du 6 mai 1999 relatif à l'Office wallon de la Formation professionnelle
et de l'Emploi, l'IFAPME et les centers de formation du Réseau IFAPME agréés en application de l'arrêté du
Gouvernement wallon du 24 avril 2014 fixant les conditions relatives à l'agrément des centers de formation pour les
indépendants et petites et moyennes entreprises et de leurs directors de centres;
5 o le intern : tout demandeur d'emploi inoccupé inscrit en tant que tel auprès du Forem et ayant sa residence
principale située and region de langue française;
6 o l'attestation de formation ou la certification professionnelle : l'attestation ou la certification délivrée par
l'opérateur de formation au terme de la formation éligible suivie par le interne, en vue d'acter l'acquisition des
competences visées par le module de formation, l'unité d'acquis d'apprentissage ou la formation. Lorsque l'attestation
ou la certification n'a pas été délivrée au sein de leur réseau, elle doit être valorisée par le Forem ou l'IFAPME;
7 o le diplôme IFAPME : le diplôme délivré par l'IFAPME ou les centers de formation du Réseau IFAPME aux
trainees ayant satisfait aux épreuves finals d'une formation de chef d'entreprise ou d'une formation de coordination
et d'encadrement ainsi que le certificat délivré par les centers du Réseau IFAPME aux apprenants ayant satisfait aux
épreuves finals d'une année préparatoire à la formation de coordination et d'encadrement ou à la formation de chef
d'entreprise;
8 o les formations éligibles : les formations menant aux métiers en pénurie de main d'œuvre ou aux fonctions
Critiques pour lesquels le Forem ou l'IFAPME on une offre de formation, arrêtées annuellement par le Ministre.
Pour l'application de la définition visée à l'alinéa 1 er , 7 o , l'attestation provisoire de réussite est assimilée à un
diploma IFAPME.
Art. 3 . § 1 er . Dans la limite des credits budgets disponibles et aux conditions du présent arrêté, le Forem octroie
un incitant financier the 350 euros au trainee qui remplit une des conditions suivantes :
1 o qui obtient une attestation de formation, une certification professionnelle, un diplôme IFAPME ou un diplôme
délivré par la Communauté française ou le cas échéant, une attestation provisoire de réussite au terme d'une formation
éligible, suivie chez un opérateur de formation, sous contrat de formation :
a) professionnelle, à temps plein et dont la durée est de quatre semaines au moins, au sens de l'article 116, § 4, de
l'arrêté royal du 25 novembre 1991 portant regulation du chômage;
b) alternée tel que prévu par le décret du 20 février 2014 relatif à la formation alternée pour les demandeurs
d'emploi et modifiant le décret du 18 juillet 1997 relatif à l'insertion de demandeurs d'emploi auprès d'employeurs qui
organisent une formation permettant d'occuper un poste vacant;
c) the chef d'entreprise, sous contrat de formation de coordination et d'encadrement ou sous contrat de formation
ayant pour objet une année préparatoire à la formation de coordination et d'encadrement ou à la formation de chef
d'entreprise, suivis sous convention de stage ou non, organisées par l'IFAPME et les centers de formation du Réseau
IFAPME agréés en application de l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 24 avril 2014 fixant les conditions relatives à
l'agrément des centers de formation pour les indépendants et petites et moyennes entreprises et de leurs directors de
centers;
2 o qui quitte une formation éligible suivie chez un opérateur de formation pour être occupé directement,
c'est-à-dire au plus tard dans les cinq jours consécutifs à l'arrêt de la formation, sous contrat de travail portant dans un
métier en pénurie de main d'œuvre ou dans une fonction critique ou pour s'installer en tant qu'indépendant à titre
principal dans un métier en pénurie de main d'œuvre ou dans une fonction critique.
§ 2. Le interne bénéficie une seule fois de l'incitant financier.
§ 3. Le Gouvernement peut adapter le montant de l'incitant financier visé à l'alinéa 1 er en fonction, notamment, des
results of the evaluation visée à l'article 8.
Art. 4 . Lorsque la formation éligible est déclinée en différents modules ou unités d'acquis d'apprentissage, son
éligibilité n'est pas conditionnée par le suivi de l'ensemble de la formation. Le suivi d'un module, d'un groupe de
modules, d'une unité d'acquis d'apprentissage ou d'un groupe d'unités d'apprentissage d'une formation éligible est
suffisante, a condition que celui-ci ou ceux-ci assure(nt) l'employabilité direct du trainee dans le métier.

Page 436
38406

MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
Art. 5 . En complément de l'incitant financier visé à l'article 3, § 1 er , alinea 1 er , en cas de réussite d'une formation
éligible, telle que visée à l'article 3, § 1 er , alinea 1 er , 1 o , ou à l'article 4, le interne se verra proposer :
1 o un module court de préparation à l'entretien d'embauche;
2 o au minimum une offerre d'emploi transmise par le Forem.
Art. 6 . L'incitant financier visé à l'article 3, § 1 er , alinea 1 er , est cumulable avec les avantages octroyés pour le suivi
d'une des formations éligibles visées à l'article 4.
Art. 7 . § 1 er . Au plus tard au jour de l'entrée en formation, sauf pour les cas où l'opérateur de formation accède
à l'information via les sources de données authentiques, le trainee remet à l'operateur de formation une copie de
l'attestation délivrée par le Forem selon laquelle il est inscrit auprès du Forem en tant que demandeur d'emploi
inoccupation.
§ 2. Dans les quinze jours à compter de la délivrance de l'attestation de formation, de la certification
professionnelle, du diplôme IFAPME ou du diplôme délivré par la Communauté française ou le cas échéant,
l'attestation provisoire de réussite, l'opérateur de formation transmet, selon les modalités déterminées par le Ministre,
au Forem la liste complète des interns et ses annexes reunissant les conditions d'octroi visées à l'article 3, § 1 er , 1 o .
La liste visée à l'alinéa 1 er est complete lorsqu'elle contient :
1 o le nom, le prénom, l'adresse de la residence principale, le numero de registre national et le numero de compte
banking de chaque trainee reunissant les conditions d'octroi visées à l'article 3, § 1 er , 1 o ;
2 o en annexe, la declaration sur l'honneur par laquelle l'opérateur de formation atteste avoir verifié que chaque
trainee repris dans la liste satisfait à la condition d'octroi visée à l'article 3, § 1 er , 1 o , et les copies de la carte d'identité
et de la carte bancaire de chaque intern.
Dans un délai de trente jours à compter de la reception de la liste complète des interns et de ses annexes, visée
à l'alinéa 1 er , le Forem notifie l'octroi de l'incitant au trainee et lui en paie le montant.
§ 3. Dans les quinze jours à compter de l'arrêt anticipé de la formation tel que prévu à l'article 3, § 1 er , 2 o ,
l'opérateur transmet au Forem la liste des interns qui quittent anticipativement une formation visée à l'article 4 ainsi
que ses annexes.
La liste visée à l'alinéa 1 er est complete lorsqu'elle contient :
1 o le nom, le prénom, l'adresse de la residence principale, le numero de registre national et le numero de compte
banking de chaque trainee reunissant les conditions d'octroi visées à l'article 3, § 1 er , 2 o ;
2 o en annexe, la declaration sur l'honneur par laquelle l'opérateur de formation atteste avoir informé chaque
trainee repris dans la liste, de l'obligation de transmettre au Forem les éléments apportant la preuve qu'il satisfait à
la condition d'octroi visée à l'article 3, § 1 er , 2 o , et les copies de la carte d'identité et de la carte bancaire de chaque
intern.
Dans un délai de trente jours à compter de la reception de la liste complète visée à l'alinéa 1 er , le Forem notifie
l'octroi de l'incitant à l'ex interne qui remplit les conditions d'octroi visées à l'article 3, § 1 er , 2 o , et lui en paie le
montant, à condition d'être en possession de documents attestation :
1 o de l'engagement de l'ex interne, sous contrat de travail portant sur un emploi dans un métier en pénurie de
main d'œuvre ou critique;
2 o de l'installation de l'ex intern en tant qu'indépendant à titre principal pour une activity portant sur un métier
and penurie de main d'œuvre ou critique,
si, dans le délai de trente jours à compter de la reception de la liste complète des interns visée à l'alinéa 1 er , le
Forem ne dispose pas des documents visés à l'alinéa 2, 1 o ou 2 o , celui-ci notifie l'octroi de l'incitant à l'ex interne, sous
reserve de la production par ce dernier dans un délai de six mois à compter du jour où le intern a quitté la formation,
des documents visés à l'alinéa 2, 1 o ou 2 o , et de leur exam par le Forem. Le Forem liquide l'incitant des que la reserve
est levee.
Le Ministre peut préciser les modalités de liquidation de l'incitant financier visé à l'article 3.
Art. 8 . Le Forem est chargé, en collaboration avec l'IFAPME, d'évaluer le dispositif au moins une fois tous les
deux ans. La première évaluation sera réalisée au dernier trimestre 2019 et portera sur les entrées en formation des
deux derniers trimestres 2018 and the trois premiers trimestres 2019.
Le rapport d'évaluation contient un volet quantitatif et un volet qualitatif dont le modèle est validé par le Ministre,
sur proposition du Committee de gestion du Forem. Il est communiqué au ministre, aux Committees de gestion du Forem et
de l'IFAPME ainsi qu'au Conseil économique, social et environnemental de Wallonie au plus tard à la fin du
premier trimestre de l'année qui suit l'année pour laquelle l'evaluation est realalisée.
Art. 9 . § 1 er . Le Forem est responsable du traitement des données à caractère personnel, en ce compris le numéro
the registre national, traitées à des fins d'octroi de l'incitant financier dans le cadre de l'execution du présent décret.
Les données à caractère personnel sont centralisées par le Forem dans le dossier unique du demandeur d'emploi.
Le Forem conserve les données à caractère personnel pour la durée nécessaire à l'execution de ses obligations et
à la gesture de son contentieux.
Le Forem traite ces données dans le respect des principles du Règlement (UE) 2016/679 du Parliament européen et
du Conseil du 27 April 2016 relatif à la protection des personnes physiques à l'égard du traitement des données à
caractère personnel et à la libre circulation de ces données, et abrogeant la Directive 95/46/CE.
§ 2. Pour les données à caractère personnel qu'ils traitent dans le cadre de l'execution du présent arrêté, les
opérateurs de formation agissent and tant que sous-traitant du Forem, au sens du règlement précité.
Le Forem conclut avec chaque sous-traitant une convention qui détermine notamment les obligations de chacun
quant au traitement des données à caractère personnel et quant a leur protection.
Art. 10 . Les délais visés par le present arrêté sont calculés en jours. Le jour de l'acte qui est le point de départ du
délai n'est pas compris. Le jour de l'échéance est compté dans le délai. Toutefois, lorsque ce jour est un samedi, un
dimanche ou un jour férié légal, le jour de l'échéance est reporté au plus prochain jour ouvrable.
Art. 11 . Le present arrêté produit ses effets le 1 er September 2018.
Art. 12 . Le Ministre de la Formation est charge de l'execution du present arrêté.
Namur, le 28 February 2019.
Pour le Gouvernement :
Le Minister-President,
W. BORSUS
Le Ministre de l'Economie, de l'Industrie, de la Recherche, de l'Innovation, du Numérique,
de l'Emploi et de la Formation,
P.-Y. JEHOLET

TRANSLATION
WALLOON GOVERNMENT SERVICE
[2019/201768]
28 FEBRUARY 2019. — Decision of the Walloon Government on the financial incentive
with a view to the transfer of job seekers to training courses
The Walloon Government,
Having regard to the decree of 6 May 1999 concerning the Office wallon de la Formation professionnelle et de l'Emploiʺ
(Walloon Vocational Training and Employment Service), Article 5(4), amended by the Decree of
May 10, 2012;
Having regard to the advice no. A.1383 of the ʺConseil économique et social de Wallonieʺ (Social and Economic Council of
Wallonia), given on September 24, 2018;
Having regard to the advice of the Management Committee of the Office wallon de la Formation professionnelle et de l'Emploiʺ,
given on August 14, 2018;
Having regard to the advice of the management committee of the ʺInstitut wallon de formation en alternance et des indépendants
et petites et moyennes entreprises ʺ (Walloon institute for alternating training self-employed and small and medium-sized
companies), given on September 20, 2018;
Having regard to the report of 3 July 2018 drawn up in accordance with Article 4, 2 o , of the Decree of 3 April 2016
implementing the resolutions of the United Nations Women's Conference adopted in September 1995
Beijing has taken place and to integrate the gender dimension into all regional policies, for
the matters governed by Article 138 of the Constitution;
Having regard to the advice of the Inspector of Finance, given on 3 July 2018;
Having regard to the consent of the Minister of Budget given on 12 July 2018;
Having regard to advice no. 64.751/4 of the Council of State, given on 13 December 2018, in accordance with Article 84, § 1,
first paragraph, 2 o , of the laws on the Council of State, coordinated on January 12, 1973;
Having regard to the opinion no. 27/2019 of the Data Protection Authority, issued on 6 February 2019;
Whereas the Government intends to retroactively grant this Decision on 1 September 2018;
Considering that the retroactive effect of administrative acts is allowed in so far as they
is necessary for the continuity of the public service and for the regularization of a legal situation or a
factual situation, insofar as it takes into account the requirements of legal certainty and individual rights;
In view of the urgent need to overcome the labor shortage in Wallonia (more than 200,000
seekers and 88 so-called shortage occupations) in accordance with the federal Jobs Deal;
Whereas the list of shortage occupations is published by the Forem each year in June;
Whereas the majority of training courses that qualify for the financial incentive and
in particular, the training courses organized by the ʺIFAPMEʺ network start in September;
Considering that the ʺConseil économique et social de Wallonieʺ, in its opinion of 24 September 2018
noted that the draft decision ʺde facto entered into force on 1 September 2018 and is already subject
part of an information and promotion campaign of the ʺForemʺ and of the IFAPMEʺ;
Noting the will of the Government to encourage job seekers to register as soon as possible for
these promising courses and therefore not to postpone their training until the adoption of this draft decree;
Considering that all trainees who pass a training course that is eligible by 1 September 2018 at the earliest,
will be able to enjoy the financial incentive thereof;
That, if retroactive effect would not apply, a jobseeker who, after having known
taken from the list of shortage occupations published in June 2018, immediately after the final adoption
of this Decree had commenced the training and had passed the said training before the final
adoption of this decision, would therefore not qualify for the incentive, while a person who
after the adoption of this decree would pass exactly for the same training for the same profession, but for the
incentive would qualify;
Whereas the retroactive effect of this draft is a way of assessing a factual
regularize;
Whereas, in the absence of such a legal basis, it should be considered that trainees
who have passed a training course as referred to in Article 4 with regard to a shortage profession or a critical profession, or who have a
have left such training to be employed under an employment contract in a
bottleneck profession or in a critical profession, would not qualify for the financial incentive as long as it
design has not been adopted;
Considering that the non-retroactivity would constitute discrimination against citizens before the law;
Considering that retroactive effect is beneficial to interested parties and, in that sense, justified
is;
On the recommendation of the Minister of Education;
After deliberation,
Decision :
Article 1. In accordance with Article 138 of the Constitution, this Decree regulates a matter referred to in Article 127, § 1,
of the Constitution.
Art. 2. For the purposes of this Decree:
1 o the Minister: the Minister of Education;
2 o the ʺForemʺ : the Office wallon de la formation professionnelle et de l'emploiʺ (Walloon service for
vocational training and employment) referred to in the Decree of 6 May 1999 on the "Office wallon de la formation"
professionnelle et de l'emploiʺ;
3 o the ʺIFAPMEʺ: the ʺInstitut wallon de formation en alternance et des indépendants et des petites et moyennes
entreprisesʺ (Walloon institute for work-linked training and the self-employed and small and medium-sized enterprises)
referred to in the decree of 17 July 2003 establishing an ʺInstitut wallon de formation en alternance et des
independants et des petites et moyennes entreprises ʺ;

Page 438
38408

MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
4 o the training provider : the ʺForemʺ, the competence centers, the Education for Social Promotion for the
professional training courses organized by or pursuant to the framework agreement for cooperation between the ʺForemʺ
and the Education for Social Advancement, the vocational training providers that the ʺForem . calls on
in accordance with article 7, second paragraph, of the decree of 6 May 1999 on the "Office wallon de la formation"
professionnelle et de l'emploiʺ, the ʺIFAPMEʺ and the training centers of the IFAPME network recognized in accordance with the
Decree of the Walloon Government of 24 April 2014 laying down the conditions for the recognition of the
training centers for the self-employed and small and medium-sized enterprises and their center director;
5 o the trainee : any unemployed jobseeker who is registered as such with the ʺForemʺ and who are
has primary residence in a French-speaking area;
6 o the training certificate or professional qualification: the certificate or qualification issued by the training
stretcher at the end of the eligible training followed by the trainee, to take note of the
acquisition of the skills referred to in the training module, the learning unit, an evaluation framework or the training.
If the attestation or qualification has not been issued within their network, it/they must pass through the ʺForemʺ or the IFAPMEʺ
be valorised;
7 o the diploma of the ʺIFAPMEʺ: the diploma awarded by the IFAPMEʺ or the training centers of the
IFAPME-net to the trainees who have passed the final tests of a training of company manager or of a
coordination and supervision training as well as the certificate issued by the centers of the IFAPME network to the
students who have passed the final tests of a preparatory year for the coordination and supervision
management or training of a manager;
8 o the eligible courses: the courses that lead to the shortage professions or to the
critical functions for which the ʺForemʺ or the IFAPMEʺ have a training offer and which are annually approved by the Minister
be established.
For the application of the definition referred to in the first paragraph, 7 o , the provisional attestation of
success equated with a diploma from the ʺIFAPMEʺ.
Art. 3 . § 1. Within the limits of the available budget appropriations and under the conditions of this Decree
the ʺForemʺ grants a financial incentive of 350 euros to the trainee who fulfills one of the following conditions:
1 o the trainee who has a training certificate, a professional qualification, a diploma from the ʺIFAPMEʺ or a diploma
issued by the French Community or, where appropriate, a provisional certificate of success for an in
qualifying training with a training provider, and who has been employed under the
of a contract for:
a) socio-professional training lasting at least four weeks, within the meaning of Article 116, § 4, of the
royal decree of 25 November 1991;
b) an alternating training, as stipulated in the Decree of 20 February 2014 on the alternating
training for jobseekers and amending the Decree of 18 July 1997 on the employment of
job seekers from employers who organize vocational training to fill a vacancy;
(c) for managerial training, coordination and supervision training or training with opleiding
with the aim of completing a preparatory year for coordination and supervision training or training as a company manager
whether or not in the context of an internship agreement and organized by the ʺIFAPMEʺ and the other training centers
of the IFAPME network recognized in accordance with the decision of the Walloon Government of 24 April 2014 determining the
conditions concerning the approval of training centers for the self-employed and small and medium-sized
companies and their center director;
2 o the trainee who leaves an eligible training course followed by a training provider in order to
to be employed directly, ie no later than within five days after the completion of the training, in the context of a
employment contract with regard to a shortage profession or in a critical position or to be self-employed as main activity
to settle in a bottleneck profession or in a critical position.
§ 2. The intern enjoys the financial incentive once.
§ 3. The Government may adjust the amount of the financial incentive referred to in paragraph 1, according to the results de
of the evaluation referred to in Article 8.
Art. 4 . When the eligible training consists of several modules and learning units, it is in
eligibility of the training referred to is not linked to the follow-up of the entire training. The
follow-up of a module, of a group of modules, of a learning unit or of a group of learning units in a
eligible training is sufficient provided that the latter has the direct employability of the
intern in business.
Art. 5 . In addition to the financial incentive referred to in Article 3, § 1, first paragraph, the trainee, if he
Article 3, § 1, paragraph 1, 1 o or the qualifying training referred to in Article 4 has been completed, which follows
offered:
1 o a short module in preparation for a job interview;
2 o at least one job offer proposed by the ʺForemʺ.
Art. 6 . The financial incentive referred to in Article 3, § 1, first paragraph, is cumulative with the benefits granted
for following one of the eligible courses referred to in Article 4.
Art. 7 . § 1. At the latest on the day of the start of the training, except in cases where the training provider
has access to the information through authentic data sources, the trainee provides the training provider with a
copy of the certificate issued by the ʺForemʺ stating that he is registered with the Foremʺ as
unemployed job seeker.
§ 2. Within fifteen days of the issuance of the training certificate, of the professional qualification, of the
diploma from ʺIFAPMEʺ or from the diploma awarded by the French Community or, where appropriate, from
the provisional certificate of success is made by the training provider in accordance with the modalities determined by the Minister
the complete list of trainees and their appendices who meet the conditions for granting referred to in Article 3, § 1, 1 o
comply with the ʺForemʺ about.
The list referred to in the first paragraph is complete if it contains the following information:
1 o the name, first name, the address of the main residence, the national register number and the number of the
bank account of each trainee who fulfills the conditions for granting referred to in Article 3, § 1, 1 o ;
2 o in annex, the declaration on honor whereby the training provider confirms that it has checked whether each op
the trainee included in the list satisfies the award condition referred to in Article 3, § 1, 1 o , and the copies of
the identity card and credit card of each trainee.
Within thirty days of receipt of the complete list of trainees referred to in paragraph 1,
and of its attachments, the ʺForemʺ means the granting of the incentive to the trainee and pays him it
amount thereof.
§ 3. Within fifteen days from the early termination of the training referred to in Article 3, § 1, 2 o
the ʺForemʺ shall draw up the list of trainees who leave early a training course referred to in Article 4 and the annexes
about it.

The list referred to in the first paragraph is complete if it contains the following information:
1, the name, the first name, the address of the main residence, the national register number and the number of the
bank account of each trainee who meets the conditions for granting referred to in Article 3, § 1 and 2 o ;
2 o in annex, the declaration on honor whereby the training provider confirms that he has each on the list
has informed the admitted trainee of the obligation to provide proof that he meets the requirements referred to in Article 3, § 1, 2 o .
conditions for the grant, to submit to the ʺForemʺ and copy the copies of the identity card and of the
bank card of each intern.
Within thirty days of receipt of the complete list referred to in paragraph 1, the
ʺForemʺ the granting of the incentive to the former trainee who meets the requirements referred to in Article 3, § 1, 2 o .
conditions and pays him the amount thereof, provided he is in possession of documents to confirm ter
from:
1 o his recruitment with an employment contract concerning a shortage profession or a critical profession;
2 o his establishment as a self-employed person in main activity for a bottleneck profession or a critical profession,
if, within thirty days of receipt of the complete list referred to in paragraph 1, the ʺForemʺ
of the trainees do not have the documents referred to in the second paragraph, 1 o or 2 o , the ʺForem betekent means the
grant of incentive to the former trainee, subject to the latter's submissionlegging
within a period of six months from the day on which he left the training, of the documents
referred to in paragraph 2, 1 o or 2 o , and of their investigation by the ʺForemʺ. The ʺForemʺ will pay the incentive as soon as
the reservation is lifted.
The Minister may determine the terms of payment of the financial incentive referred to in Article 3.
Art. 8 . The ʺForemʺ, in collaboration with the ʺIFAPMEʺ, is responsible for evaluating the facility at least
once every two years. The first evaluation will be carried out during the last quarter of 2019 and will cover
at the start of the training courses of the last two quarters of 2018 and of the first three quarters of 2019.
The evaluation report contains a quantitative and a qualitative part, the model of which is proposed by the Minister
of the management committee of the ʺForemʺ is validated. It is up to the Minister, the management committees of the
ʺForemʺ and to the IFAPMEʺ as well as to the ʺConseil économique, social et environnemental de Wallonie
at the latest by the end of the last quarter of the year following the year for which the evaluation is made.
Art. 9. § 1. The ʺForemʺ is responsible for the processing of the personal data, including the
National Register Number, with a view to granting the financial incentive in the context of the implementation of this
decree.
The personal data are centralized by the ʺForemʺ in the unique file of the job seeker.
The ʺForemʺ stores the personal data for the duration necessary for the performance of its obligations
and of the management of its disputes.
The ʺForemʺ processes this data in compliance with the principles of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the
European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of individuals with regard to
the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data and revocation of
Directive 95/46/EC.
§ 2. For the personal data that they process in the context of the implementation of this Decree, the
training providers as processors of the ʺForemʺ within the meaning of the above Regulation.
The ʺForemʺ concludes an agreement with each processor in which, in particular, everyone's obligations with regard to the
processing of personal data and with regard to their protection.
Art. 10. The periods referred to in this Decree are calculated in days. The day of the deed commencing
the term is not included. The due date is included in the term. However, if that day
Saturday, Sunday or a legal holiday, the due date is postponed to the next working day.
Art. 11 . This decision takes effect on 1 September 2018.
Art. 12 . The Minister of Education is charged with the implementation of this Decree.
Namur, February 28, 2019.
For the Government :
The prime minister,
W. BORSUS
The Minister of Economy, Industry, Research, Innovation, Digital Technologies, Employment and Training,
P.-Y. JEHOLET

*
SERVICE PUBLIC DE WALLONIA
[2019/201769]
28 FEVRIER 2019. — Arrêté du Gouvernement wallon modifiant l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 3 mai 2012
portant execution du décret du 27 octobre 2011 relatif au soutien à la creation d'emploi en favorisant les
transitions professionnelles vers le statut d'indépendant à titre principal
Le Gouvernement wallon,
Vu le décret du 27 octobre 2011 relatif au soutien à la creation d'emploi en favorisant les transitions professionnelles
vers le statut d'indépendant à titre principal, les articles 3, alineas 3 et 4, 5, § 3, 6, alinea 3, et 8, § 4, alinea 1 er ;
Vu l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 3 mai 2012 portant execution du décret du 27 octobre 2011 relatif au
soutien à la creation d'emploi en favorisant les transitions professionnelles vers le statut d'independant à titre principal;
Vu le rapport du 8 novembre 2018 portant sur l'évaluation de l'impact sur la situation respective des femmes et
des hommes établi conformément à l'article 3, 2 o , du décret du 11 avril 2014 visant à la mise en œuvre des résolutions
de la Conférence des Nations unions sur les femmes à Pékin de septembre 1995 et intégrant la dimension du genre dance
l'ensemble des politiques regionales;
Vu l'avis n o A.1399 du Conseil économique, social et environnemental de Wallonie, donné le 17 December 2018;
Vu l'avis du Comité de gestion de l'Office wallon de la formation professionnelle et de l'emploi, donné
le 24 December 2018;
Vu l'avis de l'Inspecteur des Finances, donné le 30 October 2018;
Vu l'accord du Ministre du Budget, donné le 16 November 2018;

Page 440
38410

MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
Vu la demande d'avis dans un délai de 30 jours adressée au Conseil d'État le 28 Janvier 2019, and application de
l'article 84, § 1, paragraph 1, 2 o , des lois sur le Conseil d'État, coordonnées le 12 Janvier 1973;
Considérant l'absence de communication de l'avis dans ce délai;
Vu l'article 84, § 4, paragraph 2, des lois sur le Conseil d'État, coordonnées le 12 Janvier 1973;
Considérant que dans le cadre de la procedure d'inscription auprès de la Banque carrefour des entreprises, telle
qu'imposée en vertu de l'article III.16 du Code de droit économique, le SPF Economy, process à la verification des
capacités entrepreneuriales et des conditions d'accès à la profession selon l'activité exercée;
Considérant que pour obtenir l'incitant Airbag, le candidat doit notamment apporter la preuve qu'il respecte les
dispositions légales et réglementaires fixant la protection du titre professionnel et l'exercice des professions
intellectuelles prestataires de services alors que cette condition est déjà verifiée;
Que l'exigence de cette preuve dans les demandes d'octroi de l'incitant fait double emploi avec un contrôle
equivalent assuré par un autre pouvoir public avant le démarrage de l'activité indépendante;
Que la production à deux reprises d'une telle preuve fait peser sur l'usager une charge administrative
disproportionnée par rapport à la finalité poursuivie par l'exigence de cette modalité prévue dans le décret du
October 27, 2011 précité;
Considérant que de manière générale, le présent arrêté s'inscrit dans un objectif de simplification administrative
du dispositif reposant sur le principle de confiance, et sur une volonté d'allègement des formalités prévues au level
the demandes d'octroi;
Que pour ces raisons, il ya lieu the modifier l'article 4 de l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 3 mai 2012 précité
pour replacer la production de certains documents par un engagement sur l'honneur;
Considérant également que les critères de détermination des secteurs et publics prioritaires fixés dans l'arrêté du
Wallon Governorate on May 3, 2012 précité manquent de clarté et doivent être actualisés;
Sur la proposition du Ministre de l'Economie et de l'Emploi;
Apres deliberation,
Arrete :
Article 1 er . Dans l'article 1 er de l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 3 mai 2012 portant exécution du décret du
27 octobre 2011 relatif au soutien à la création d'emploi en favorisant les transitions professionnelles vers le statut
d'indépendant à titre principal, le 2 o est remplacé par ce qui suit :
« 2 o le ministre ʺ : le ou les ministres ayant l'Economie et l'Emploi dans leurs attributions; ».
Art. 2. A l'article 3 du même arrêté, les modifications suivantes sont apportées :
1 o le paragraphe 2 est complété par les 3 o et 4 o rédigés comme suit :
« 3 o soit un diplôme d'enseignement supérieur de type court ou de type long en matière de gestion, the commerce,
d'économie, délivré par des organismes d'enseignement agréés, subventionnés ou organisés par les pouvoirs publics,
ou tout autre titre equivalent reconnu par le Gouvernement;
4 o soit, lorsque la personne qui désire s'installer comme indépendant à titre principal est âgée de plus de
cinquante ans, un certificat relatif aux connaissances de gestion de base visé par l'article 3, alinea 1 er , de la
loi-programme du 10 février 1998 pour la promotion de l'entreprise indépendante, dont le contenu est détaillé à
l'article 6 de l'arrêté royal du 21 octobre 1998 portant exécution du Chapitre I er du Titre II de la loi program du
10 février 1998 pour la promotion de l'entreprise indépendante et une declaration sur l'honneur attestant d'une
expérience professionnelle d'au moins trois ans dans le meme secteur professionnel d'activités que celui de son
installation à titre principal et ce, dans les huit ans précédant l'introduction de la demande. »;
2 o dans le paragraphe 4, à l'alinéa unique, le premier tiret est abrogé;
3 o le paragraphe 4 est complété par les deux tirets rédigés comme suit :
« - les bénéficiaires dont l'activité indépendante relève d'un secteur en pénurie conformément à la liste des métiers
and penurie établie par le Forem;
- les bénéficiaires dont l'activité indépendante relève d'un secteur à plus-value technologique, notamment, le
secteur de l'innovation ou le secteur du numerique. ».
Art. 3. A l'article 4, § 1 er , du même arrêté, les modifications suivantes sont apportées :
a) le 2 o est remplacé par ce qui suit :
« 2 o une declaration sur l'honneur, datée et signée par le demandeur, par laquelle il atteste qu'il ne se trouve dance
aucune des situations visées à l'article 4, alinea 1 er , 1 o à 4 o , du décret; »;
b) le 3 o est abrogé;
c) le 4 o est complété par les mots « aussi longtemps que l'Office wallon de la formation professionnelle et de
l'emploi, ci-après dénommé « l'Office », ne dispose pas de l'accès aux données authentiques de l'Institut national
d'assurances socials pour travailleurs independants; »;
d) au 6 o , les mots « pour les personnes visées à l'article 3, alinea 1 er , 1 o , du décret, un avertissement-extrait de rôle
émanant du Service public fédéral des Finances pour le dernier exercise d'imposition disponible, ainsi que » sont
abrogés;
e) le 7 o , est remplacé par ce qui suit :
« 7 o pour les personnes visées à l'article 3, paragraph 1 er , 2 o , du décret, la copie du diplôme, de l'attestation, du titre
ou du certificat visé à l'article 3, § 2, paragraph 1 er 1 o à 4 o ; »;
f) au 9 o , les mots « à l'article 3, point 3, du Règlement CE n o 1998/2006 de la Commission du 15 December 2006
concernant l'application des articles 87 et 88 du Traité aux aides de minimis » sont remplacés par les mots « au
règlement UE 1407/2013 de la Commission du 18 décembre 2013 relatif à l'application des articles 107 et 108 du traité
sur le functionnement de l'Union européenne aux aides de minimis »;
g) le paragraphe 1 er est complété par quatre alineas rédigés comme suit:
ʺ Concernant l'alinéa 1 er , 7 o , en outre, pour les personnes visées à l'article 3, alinéa 6, du décret, la demande visée
à l'article 5, § 1 er , alinea 1 er , du décret comprend une declaration sur l'honneur, datée et signée par le demandeur. Cette
declaration atteste que le demandeur, au cours de la dernière année précédant l'introduction de sa demande, a entrepris
des démarches ou mené des actions permettant de compléter ses compétences dans le secteur ou la branch d'activité
dans laquelle il souhaite s'établir ou en terms de gestion au sens de l'article 3, alinea 6, du décret et de l'article 3, 3,
alineas 3 et 4. A la demande du Forem, le cas échéant, ces démarches sont prouvées par les attestations ou certifications
d'operateurs de formations ou d'enseignement agréés, subventionnés ou organisés par les pouvoirs publics visées à
l'article 3, § 3, paragraph 4, ou par une experience professionnelle.

Page 441
38411

MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
En application de l'article 6, alinea 1 er , 2 o , du décret, en ce qui concerne l'appréciation de la faisabilité du projet et
le caractère directement opérationnel de celui-ci, le demandeur qui a bénéficié de l'appui d'un expert-comptable ou
conseiller fiscal inscrit auprès de l'Institut des Experts-comptables et des Conseils fiscaux ou auprès de l'Institut
professionnel des Comptables et Fiscalistes agréés est, eu égard au protocole d'accord du 11 December 2018 conclu entre
le ministre et l'Institut des Experts-comptables et des Conseils fiscaux et l'Institut professionnel des Comptables et
Fiscalistes agréés, dispensé de produire à l'appui de sa demande, les données relative à l'approche Financière du projet.
Lorsque le Forem ou le Comité de sélection l'estime nécessaire, le Forem peut soliciter auprès du demandeur, des
informations supplémentaires pour apprécier la satisfaction du project à la condition visée à l'article 6, 2 o , du décret.
Dans le cadre de l'instruction des demandes de l'incitant, l'Office accède aux sources de données authentiques
nécessaires à la vérification des conditions d'octroi prévues par ou en vertu des articles 3 et 4 du décret.
Dans le cadre de l'instruction des demandes de l'incitant, lorsque le present article prévoit la production d'une
declaration sur l'honneur datée et signée par le demandeur, l'Office peut, le cas échéant, obtenir la preuve probante du
content of the declaration en accédant aux sources de données authentiques ou en applicant la production de
documents probants auprès du demandeur. ».
Art. 4. Dans l'article 9, § 3, paragraph 2, du même arrêté, les mots ʺ un avertissement extrait de rôle émanant du Service
public fédéral des finances pour le dernier exercise d'imposition disponible » sont insérés entre les mots « les facturiers
d'entrée et de sortie » et les mots « , etc. ».
Art. 5. Le présent arrêté entre en vigueur le 1 er April 2019.
Art. 6. Le Ministre de l'Economie et le Ministre de l'Emploi sont charges de l'execution du présent arrêté.
Namur, le 28 February 2019.
Pour le Gouvernement :
Le Minister-President,
W. BORSUS
Le Ministre de l'Economie, de l'Industrie, de la Recherche, de l'Innovation, du Numérique,
de l'Emploi et de la Formation,
P.-Y. JEHOLET

TRANSLATION
WALLOON GOVERNMENT SERVICE
[2019/201769]
28 FEBRUARY 2019. — Decree of the Walloon Government amending the decree of 3 May 2012 implementing
of the Decree of 27 October 2011 on support for job creation through the promotion of
professional transition to self-employed status as main activity
The Walloon Government,
Having regard to the Decree of 27 October 2011 on support for job creation through the promotion of
professional transition to the status of self-employed person as main activity, Articles 3, paragraphs 3 and 4, 5, § 3, 6,
third paragraph, and 8, § 4, first paragraph;
Having regard to the decision of the Walloon Government of 3 May 2012 implementing the decree of 27 October 2011
on support for job creation through the promotion of career transition to the status of
self-employed as main activity;
In view of the evaluation report of 8 November 2018 on the impact of the project on the respective
condition of women and men, in accordance with Article 3, 2 o , of the Decree of 11 April 2014 on implementation
of the resolutions of the United Nations Women's Conference held in Beijing in September 1995
and to integrate the gender dimension into all regional policies;
Having regard to the advice no. A.1399 of the Conseil économique, social et environnemental de Wallonieʺ (Economic,
Social and Environmental Council of Wallonia), given on December 17, 2018;
Having regard to the advice of the Management Committee of the Office wallon de la Formation professionnelle et de l'Emploi
(Walloon Service for Vocational Training and Placement), delivered on December 24, 2018;
Having regard to the advice of the Inspector of Finance, given on October 30, 2018;
Having regard to the consent of the Minister of Budget given on 16 November 2018;
In view of the request for advice within a period of thirty days, addressed to the Council of State on
28 January 2019, in accordance with Article 84, § 1, first paragraph, 2 o , of the Acts on the Council of State, coordinated on
January 12, 1273;
In view of the lack of advice within that period;
Having regard to Article 84, § 4, second paragraph, of the Acts on the Council of State, coordinated on January 12, 1973;
Considering that the FPS Economy, in the context of the registration procedure at the Crossroads Bank of
Companies, as imposed by Article III.16 of the Code of Economic Law, the entrepreneurial skills
and monitors the conditions of access to the profession according to the activity performed;
Considering that, in order to receive the Airbag incentive, the candidate must in particular prove that he/she has the legal
and regulatory provisions establishing the protection of the professional title and the exercise of the
comply with service intellectual professions while this condition has already been verified;
That the requirement of this proof in the applications for the award of the incentive and an equivalent verification by
another public authority overlap before the start of the self-employed activity;
That submitting such proof twice places a disproportionate administrative burden on the user
in proportion to the aim pursued by the requirement of this modality as provided for in the aforementioned decree
dated October 27, 2011;

Page 442
38412

MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
Whereas, in general, this Decision is part of an objective of administrative
simplification of the provision based on the principle of legitimate expectations and on the desire to simplify the formalities
to make the connection with grant applications more flexible;
That Article 4 of the above-mentioned decision of the Walloon Government of 3 May 2012 must be amended for these reasons
to replace the production of certain documents by a pledge on their honor;
Whereas the criteria for determining the priority sectors and target groups as defined in bepaald
the above-mentioned decision of the Walloon government of 3 May 2012 are also unclear and should be updated;
On the recommendation of the Minister of Economy and Employment;
After deliberation,
Decision :
Article 1. In Article 1 of the Decree of the Walloon Government of 3 May 2012 implementing the Decree of
27 October 2011 on supporting job creation through the promotion of career transition to status
of self-employed as main activity, point 2 o is replaced as follows:
ʺ2 o the Minister: the Minister(s) competent for Economy and Employment;ʺ.
Art. 2. The following amendments are made to Article 3 of the same Decree:
1 o paragraph 2 is supplemented by points 3 o and 4 o , which read as follows:
ʺ3 o either a higher education diploma (short type or long type) in management, trade, economics,
delivered by educational establishments recognised, subsidized or organized by the public authorities or any other
equivalent diploma recognized by the Government;
4 o or when the person who wishes to establish himself as a self-employed person as his main activity,
is more than fifty years old, a certificate relating to the basic knowledge of management referred to in Article 3,
first paragraph, of the program law of 10 February 1998 for the promotion of self-employment, of which
the content is detailed in Article 6 of the Royal Decree of 21 October 1998 implementing Chapter I
of Title II of the Program Act of February 10, 1998 for the promotion of self-employment, and a
Declaration on honor attesting to professional experience of at least three years in the same professional
sector of activity as that of its establishment as its main activity, and this, within eight years before the submission of the
application;";
2 o in paragraph 4, in the single paragraph, the first indent is deleted;
3 o paragraph 4 is supplemented by the following two indents, which read as follows:
ʺ-the beneficiaries whose activity as a self-employed person falls under a bottleneck sector in accordance with the
ʺForemʺ established list of shortage occupations;
- the beneficiaries whose activity as a self-employed person falls under a sector with a technological added value, with
especially in the innovation sector or the digital sector.ʺ.
Art. 3. The following amendments are made to Article 4, § 1, of the same Decree:
(a) point 2o is replaced by the following:
ʺ2 o a declaration of honor, dated and signed by the applicant, in which he declares that he does not
is in one of the situations referred to in Article 4, first paragraph, 1e o to 4 o inclusive , of the Decree;
b) point 3o is lifted;
c) point 4 o is completed by the words ʺas long as the ʺOffice wallon de la formation professionnelle et de
l'emploiʺ, hereinafter referred to as the Serviceʺ, does not have access to the authentic data of the National Institute
for the Social Insurance of the Self-Employed (RSVZ);
d) in 6 o the words ʺ for the persons referred to in Article 3, first paragraph, 1e o of the Decree, an assessment notice
of the Federal Public Service Finance for the last available tax year as well asʺ abolished;
(e) point 7o is replaced by the following:
ʺ7 o for the persons referred to in Article 3, first paragraph, 2 o , of the decree, the copy of the diploma, of the
certificate, of the title or of the certificate referred to in Article 3, § 2, first paragraph, 1 o to 4 o inclusive ;
f) in 9o , the words ʺArticle 3(3) of Regulation EC No 1998/2006 of 15 December 2006 on
the application of Articles 87 and 88 of the Treaty to de minimis aid ʺ replaced by the words
ʺCommission Regulation (EU) No 1407/2013 of 18 December 2013 on the application of the
Articles 107 and 108 of the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union to de minimis aidʺ;
g) paragraph 1 is supplemented by a paragraph that reads as follows:
ʺ With regard to the first paragraph, 7 o , the application referred to in Article 5, § 1, first paragraph, of the Decree contains, for the
persons referred to in Article 3, sixth paragraph, of the Decree, additionally a declaration on their honor dated and
signed by the applicant. This declaration on honor confirms that during the last year the applicant aanvrager
has taken steps or actions before submitting his application to improve his skills
in the sector or industry in which he wishes to establish himself and/or in management within the meaning of Article 3,
sixth paragraph, of the Decree and of Article 3, § 3, third and fourth paragraphs. At the request of the ʺForemʺ, these steps,
where appropriate, proven by the attestations or qualifications of training providers referred to in Article 3, § 3, fourth paragraph
or education providers recognised, subsidized or organized by governments or by professional experience.
In accordance with Article 6, first paragraph, 2 o , of the Decree and with regard to the assessment of the feasibility of the
project and its direct operational nature, the applicant who has benefited from the support is
accountant or a tax advisor registered with the Institute of Accountants and Tax Consultants or
at the Professional Institute of Recognized Bookkeepers and Fiscalists, in accordance with the agreement protocol of
December 11, 2018 concluded between the Minister and the Institute of Accountants and Tax Consultants and the
Professional Institute of Recognized Bookkeepers and Fiscalists, exempt from the obligation to support
his application to provide details of the financial approach of the project. When the ʺForemʺ or the
Selection Committee deems it necessary, the ʺForemʺ may ask the applicant for additional information to verify whether the
project meets the condition stated in Article 6, 2 o , of the Decree.
In the context of the processing of requests for the incentive, the Service has access to the authentic
data sources necessary for the verification of the grant conditions determined by or pursuant to the
Articles 3 and 4 of the Decree.
In the context of the processing of requests for the incentive, the Service may, when this article in the
provision of a declaration on honor dated and signed by the applicant, where applicable
receive proof of the content of the statement in case he has access to the authentic data sources
or requesting the applicant to submit supporting documents.ʺ.

Page 443
38413

MONITOR BELGE — 15.04.2019 — BELGIAN OFFICIAL GAAP
Art. 4. In Article 9, § 3, second paragraph, of the same Decree, the words ʺan assessment notice of the Federal
Government Department of Finance for the last available tax yearʺ inserted between the words ʺthe incoming and
outgoing invoice booksʺ and the words ʺ, etc.ʺ.
Art. 5. This Decision shall enter into force on 1 April 2019.
Art. 6. The Minister of Economy and the Minister of Employment are charged with the implementation of this Decree.
Namur, February 28, 2019.
For the Government :
The prime minister,
W. BORSUS
The Minister of Economy, Industry, Research, Innovation, Digital Technologies, Employment and Training,
P.-Y. JEHOLET

REGION DE BRUXELLES-CAPITAL — BRUSSELS CAPITAL REGION

REGION DE BRUXELLES-CAPITAL

BRUSSELS CAPITAL REGION
[C−2019/11788]

[C−2019/11788]

4 AVRIL 2019. — Ordonnance portant assentiment à l'accord de
coopération du 5 octobre 2018 entre l'Etat fédéral, la Région
flamande, la Région wallonne et la Région de Bruxelles-Capitale
relatif au financement des infrastructures ferroviaires stratégiques

APRIL 4, 2019. — Ordinance consenting to the
cooperation agreement of 5 October 2018 between the Federal
State, the Flemish Region, the Walloon Region and the Brussels
Capital Region regarding the financing of the strategic
gic railway infrastructures

Le Parliament de la Région de Bruxelles-Capitale a adopté et Nous,
Government, sanctionnons ce qui suit :

The Parliament of the Brussels-Capital Region has adopted and We,
Government, ratify, the following:

Article 1 er . La présente ordonnance règle une matière visée à
l'article 39 of the Constitution.

Article 1. This ordinance regulates a matter as referred to
in Article 39 of the Constitution.

Art. 2. Assentment est donné à l'accord de coopération du
5 octobre 2018 entre l'État fédéral, la Région flamande, la Région
wallonne et la Région de Bruxelles-Capitale relatif au financement des
infrastructures ferroviaires stratégiques.

Art. 2. Consent is given to the cooperation agreement
of 5 October 2018 between the Federal State, the Flemish Region, the
Walloon Region and the Brussels-Capital Region regarding the
financing the strategic railway infrastructures.

Promulguons la present ordonnance, ordonnons qu'elle soit publiée
au Moniteur belge .

Promulgate this ordinance, order that they be written in Belgian
Official Gazette will be published.

Brussels, le 4 April 2019.

Brussels, April 4, 2019.
